title: Article Posted on: District Detroit Development Underway, and on Camera
text:
Olympia Development of Michigan launched this week of a 24/7 live streaming webcam displaying construction of The District Detroitdevelopment as well as the new Detroit Events Center.
A camera provides continuous live streaming video of the 12-acre events center construction site. This site includes the new Red Wings arena, as well as surrounding neighborhood-friendly office and retail buildings, the Via and a public piazza. The development area is part of the larger District Detroit project that will connect downtown to Midtown.
The district will be made up of a mix of sports and entertainment venues, including six theaters and three multi-use sports venues—home to the Detroit Red Wings, the Detroit Tigers and the Detroit Lions. PLans for the district also include residential, office and retail developments that connect these venues into one contiguous, walkable area.
